author: dinardo
body:
A DQM shifter pointer me to a feature of the layout that might be misunderstood,
therefore I decided to simplify the histograms: I removed the ShiftFillLast and I
made all plots with a fixed X axis range that span over 20h of uninterrupted running
I tried to rebase PR #11388 and I ended up here. I hope it's rebased.
- Mauro.
title: Removed ShiftFillLast for static histogram X range
